ygData.subject: Partnerships
ygData.msgSnippet: Aracnia turned to the image of Kitkat on the monitor. She looked tired, beaten, ragged. She was definetly under alot of stress lately. We can hold them over

Subject: Partnerships
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Windows AOL sub 41
From: JP3884@...

    Aracnia turned to the image of Kitkat on the monitor. She looked tired, 
beaten, ragged. She was definetly under alot of stress lately. "We can hold 
them over the comm-link, its not top secret."
    She took a seat and began, "Now, both of us are capable leaders with 
capable crews, but the Predacons seem to be getting more and more distnat 
from each other. Thats why I wish to join your group. Together, under your 
leadership, and with my own input, I think both of our teams could unite the 
Predacons for good. Right now, our main problem is Hell Beast and Megatron. 
Hell Beast left and I cant locate him anywhere, I fear that he might decide 
to take Megatron out himself, and if he fails Megatron would surely convert 
him. Together they would be unstopable. So, what do you say? Do I have the 
honor of joining your team or what?" She said, truthfully and with no hint of 
treachery. Aracnia really did want to join with Kitkat....the backstabbing 
games were over. This was a time to be serious.

    Tarantulas and Aerostreak limed after Hell Beast, a good distance behinde 
them. Tarantulas wasnt going to let this chance pass him by, to find Megatron 
that is. Once located he would tell Aracnia and get all the credit.
    "Hurry up bird brain! Were going to lose them!" The spider hissed at 
Aerostreak who scooted after the spider in vhicle form. He was hard to keep 
up with.
    "Shut up you fatt assed spider! I cant go as fast as you!" He said back, 
and looked on the scanners to see that Hell Beast and Gremlin came to an 
abrupt stop at a moutian. "Why stop at a mountian?"
    They continued on in the artic cold until the mountian came into view. 
The signitures of Hell Beast and Gremlin were at the base of the mound. 
Tarantulas and Aerostreak stoped and watched.

    "Who the hell is it? How did they find me?" Megatron screamed at the 
Maximal counterparts, who still didnt realize they were serving a Predacon. 
He glared a them, "Well damn it?"
    Nighteyes spoke, "Sir, they claim to be Senetor Hell Beast and Major 
Gremlin. Ive never heard of them before." She then put her head down and went 
back in line.
    Megatron thought a moment. This could be a trap, or a very good 
oppertunity. With Ol' Hell Beast on his side, they would make an exceptional 
fighting force. If he were to talk to Hell Beast himself.....
    "Take them to the main entrance. I will meet them there. I want you armed 
and ready to fight if nessecery. Understood?" He said getting up.
    Waspinator nodded and left to let Hell Beast and Gremlin inside while the 
three Maximals grabed wepons and left. Megatron prepared himself for what 
might be a meeting of bloodshed, or a meeting of destiny.
